plugins.name: Rename Today
plugins.description: The Date Updater plugin allows you to easily and swiftly rename selected frames by either replacing or appending today's date in the format YYMMDD. Whether you're working on daily design drafts or just need to version your designs by date, this plugin simplifies the process and enhances your workflow. Just select the frames and click "Change" to update!
plugins.tagline: Automatically update frame names with today's date.

67189.name: Rename Today
67189.description: The Date Updater plugin allows you to easily and swiftly rename selected frames by either replacing or appending today's date in the format YYMMDD. Whether you're working on daily design drafts or just need to version your designs by date, this plugin simplifies the process and enhances your workflow. Just select the frames and click "Change" to update!
67189.release_notes:
Rename Today - Version 2.0 Release Notes

1. Enhanced Date Selection - Introduced a new date picker that allows users to select any date for renaming frames, not just today's date.
2. Redesigned UI - Updated the user interface with a cleaner and more modern design, improving user experience.
3. Localized Button Label - Depending on the region, the button label changes to provide a more localized feel.
4. Bug Fixes - Addressed issues from the previous version to ensure smoother performance.
67189.tagline: Automatically update frame names with today's date.

plugins.name: onecopy
plugins.description: Introducing onecopy, a Figma plugin that harnesses the capabilities of ChatGPT to simplify your design process. Use it to generate custom placeholder text, spur creativity, and boost productivity during design creation. Use oneCopy to paraphrase, translate or create variants of your text. Its capabilities are only limited by your imagination. Not only does it fill your mockups but also adds context and value, empowering your designs with the spark they need.
plugins.tagline: Elevate your work with ChatGPT

plugins.name: Export Frames to EPS
plugins.description:
Export selected frames in your Figma file directly to EPS (Encapsulated PostScript) format.

Useful for print-ready designs, Adobe Illustrator workflows, or vector publishing.


✅ Supports exporting multiple frames

✅ Each frame becomes a separate EPS file

✅ Fast and simple — no need to leave Figma

✅ Works with external EPS converter server

✅ Built for professional use in print, packaging, and editorial
plugins.tagline: One-click EPS export for your Figma frames

plugins.name: Retool Theme Generator
plugins.description:
Overview

This plugin allows you to quickly import your color variables from a Figma file into a Retool theme.


How to use

  1. Run the plugin
  2. Choose the variable collection you'd like to export
  3. Download your theme
  4. Upload your theme to Retool
plugins.tagline: Create and download a Retool theme from your Figma variables.

98229.name: Retool Theme Generator
98229.description:
Overview

How to use

  2. Choose the variable collection you'd like to export
  3. Download your theme
  4. Upload your theme to Retool

networkAccess.reasoning: MyPlugin needs to access Retool API for theming.

98229.tagline: Create and download a Retool theme from your Figma variables.

plugins.name: Apply Scrim Overlay
plugins.description:
This plugin help designing user interface where the entire screen darkens, and another component (e.g. dialog) overlays on top.


Select a frame and run the plugin. All objects in the frame will be grouped as a locked frame named 'BASE'. A locked rectangle named 'SCRIM' will be added to the frame.


If there's a Color style named 'Scrim' in the Local styles, a rectangle with that style will be added.
plugins.tagline: Add a rectangle to the top layer within the selected frame.

66727.name: Apply Scrim Overlay
66727.description:
This plugin help designing user interface where the entire screen darkens, and another component (e.g. dialog) overlays on top.


Select a frame and run the plugin. All objects in the frame will be grouped as a locked frame named 'BASE'. A locked rectangle named 'SCRIM' will be added to the frame.


If there's a Color style named 'Scrim' in the Local styles, a rectangle with that style will be added.
66727.tagline: Add a rectangle to the top layer within the selected frame.

plugins.name: Mock Builder
plugins.description:
This is a beta release, and may contain minor bugs. Please report any bugs or feature requests to GitHub.


Mock Builder fills a large gap that other fake-data plugins have. Many plugins give you the option for inserting just one data type, which means that doing things like 'Lastname, Firstname' in the same text node impossible. Another example is one plugin may format phone numbers one way, or may output multiple types of formats. Neither of these may work how you want.


Mock Builder allows you to format your data how you want, using multiple types of dynamic fake data in the same text node along with static text.


Mock Builder data uses the falso.js library under the hood.
plugins.tagline: Quickly Build Fake Data, Endless Combinations

60429.name: Mock Builder
60429.description:
This is a beta release, and may contain minor bugs. Please report any bugs or feature requests to GitHub.


Mock Builder fills a large gap that other fake-data plugins have. Many plugins give you the option for inserting just one data type, which means that doing things like 'Lastname, Firstname' in the same text node impossible. Another example is one plugin may format phone numbers one way, or may output multiple types of formats. Neither of these may work how you want.


Mock Builder allows you to format your data how you want, using multiple types of dynamic fake data in the same text node along with static text.


Mock Builder data uses the falso.js library under the hood.

networkAccess.reasoning: Mock Builder requires an external script for retrieving fake data.

60429.tagline: Quickly Build Fake Data, Endless Combinations

plugins.name: Bloom
plugins.description:
Bloom

This little figma plugin helps you to create parameterized flower / star vector shape with ease.

You can explore combinations of parameters to create your own favorite shapes.


Create:

  1. Drag or click the controls to change the shape, preview in realtime on the left side.
  2. Hit "Create" button to add it on the page.


View bezier curve control points of vector shape:

Turn on the 'Show Bezier Controls' switch.


Update:

  1. Select the vector shape created by this plugin.
  2. Change parameters using controls.
  3. The 'Create' button will change to 'Update', just click it.
plugins.tagline: Create, edit dynamic flower vector shape with parameters

135028.description:

plugins.name: Metaballs Ninja
plugins.description:
Elevate your designs with the Metaballs Ninja Plugin and explore the creative potential of organic shapes today!


Dynamic Shape Generation

Instantly create smooth, organic metaball shapes from simple circle objects.


Adjustable Magnetism

Control magnetism strength to determine how strongly circles blend together, allowing for unique shape variations.


Versatile Applications

Perfect for website design, logo creation, custom illustrations, interactive UI elements, and more.


Intuitive User Interface

User-friendly controls with real-time previews make designing metaballs effortless.


Customizable Colors

Easily select and apply colors to your metaball shapes to match your project's palette.


Seamless Figma Integration

Import your custom metaball creations directly into your Figma projects with one click.


Fast and Responsive Editing

Adjust individual metaball sizes and positions to fine-tune your designs.

accepted.name: BrandNinjas
accepted.description: UI/UX designer crafting Figma plugins for creatives and efficiency seekers.

plugins.tagline: Create organic metaball shapes

plugins.name: Frame Duplicator
plugins.description:
Duplicate the selected frame into any number of new sizes, perfect for creating large quantities of display ads and similar tasks.


Here's how:

Prepare your design using Figma's built-in Auto Layout properties or Constraints settings for scaling.


For example:

JBL-Summer-200x300

JBL-Summer-1200x400


Provide a list of sizes, separated by line breaks. You can include additional text in each line, which will be used to name the frames.


The plugin creates duplicates of the master frame in your specified sizes and adjusts the elements according to the settings, scaling, resizing, and repositioning as necessary.

accepted.name: DigiComm
accepted.description:
Web Design Agency
Design ✶ Animation ✦ Development

plugins.tagline: Duplicate and resize from list input

Provide a list of sizes, separated by line breaks. You can include additional text in each line, which will be used to name the frames.


The plugin creates duplicates of the master frame in your specified sizes and adjusts the elements according to the settings, scaling, resizing, and repositioning as necessary.
79094.tagline: Duplicate and resize from list input

plugins.name: Documentation Link Bulk Edit
plugins.description:
Maintaining your design system has now become easier with the assistance of this super handy plugin. No longer do you need to edit the documentation link for each component individually.


Instructions

  • Select all the components or components sets you wish to edit the documentation link.
  • Paste the documentation link and click ”Update Link”.
  • If you wish to clear/remove the documentation links, simply leave the input field empty and click ”Update Link”.
  • Ensure you only select main components or component sets; component instances won't work.


How to reach out and support

Please send comments and suggestions to rodrigodaudskeff@gmail.com or simply post a comment here.
plugins.tagline: Easily edit the documentation link of multiple components with a single click.

72428.name: Documentation Link Bulk Edit
72428.description:

Instructions

  • Select all the components or components sets you wish to edit the documentation link.
  • Paste the documentation link and click ”Update Link”.
  • If you wish to clear/remove the documentation links, simply leave the input field empty and click ”Update Link”.
  • Ensure you only select main components or component sets; component instances won't work.


How to reach out and support

Please send comments and suggestions to rodrigodaudskeff@gmail.com or simply post a comment here.
72428.release_notes: Fixed the issue of removing the documentation link for multiple components inside a component set.
72428.tagline: Easily edit the documentation link of multiple components with a single click.

plugins.description:

plugins.name: BlockFlow
plugins.description:
BlockFlow is a Figma plugin that allows you to easily convert your designs into WordPress blocks. This plugin is designed to simplify the process of transforming your visual projects into functional WordPress code. The exported blocks do not contain inline styles and rely solely on the logical attributes of the supported blocks.


Playground file https://www.figma.com/community/file/1414876266658754316/blockflow-playground


Usage

  1. Select the design elements you want to convert into WordPress blocks
  2. Open the BlockFlow plugin from the Figma toolbar
  3. Click the "Convert to blocks" button in the plugin interface
  4. The plugin will automatically convert the selected elements into WordPress blocks
  5. Once the conversion is complete, the HTML code of the blocks will be copied to your clipboard
  6. Paste the copied code into your WordPress editor or HTML file


Supported blocks


  1. Group
  2. Separator
  3. Image
  4. Buttons
  5. Paragraph
  6. Headings
  7. Cover
  8. Columns
  9. List
  10. Media & Text
  11. Blockquote
  12. Pullquote
  13. Details
  14. Icon block - third party plugin
  15. Advanced Columns – third party plugin


Tips for optimal use


  1. Follow instructions on the Playground file https://www.figma.com/community/file/1414876266658754316/blockflow-playground
  2. Organize your Figma design logically, grouping related elements using the auto-layout feature when necessary.
  3. If you need to create a list, you can use a group by naming the block list and the child elements list-item.
  4. A list can also be created by applying the text list style and naming the element list.
  5. The aspect ratio from rectangles with an image layer will be automatically extracted and adjusted to the closest WordPress predefined default ratio.
  6. The list item block in WordPress only supports text, so any other element in your list group will not be exported.
  7. Configure the layout size in the advanced settings panel according to your theme settings.


Note

In this early experimental phase, the plugin does not provide controls to define or import the information found in the theme.json file.
plugins.tagline: Convert your Figma design to WordPress Blocks

plugins.name: DLTA
plugins.description:
The Delta Wireframe Converter plugin for Figma revolutionizes the design workflow by enabling the conversion of static wireframes, HTML, and CSS into dynamic Figma layers. Created by DLTA, this innovative tool enhances collaboration between designers and developers, ensuring consistency and precision in your design projects.

Key Features and Functionality:

Wireframe to Figma Conversion:

Automatically transform your static wireframes into interactive Figma layers.

Retain the original layout and structure for a seamless design transition.

HTML Integration:

Import HTML files directly into Figma, converting code into fully functional design layers.

Preserve the integrity of web designs, making manual adjustments unnecessary.

Secure Authorization:

Safely authorize access to DLTA’s services, ensuring your data remains protected.

Manage permissions effectively to maintain the security of your projects.
plugins.tagline: Convert wireframes, HTML, and CSS into interactive Figma layers seamlessly.

plugins.name: DSekon Auto Arrange
plugins.description:
The plugin moves the elements to the next line AUTOMATICALLY.


  1.  Launch the plugin. The UI panel opens.
  2. Select a bunch of items.
  3. Use button “+” to create an adaptive auto layout.
  4. Change the frame width.
  5. The elements will be rearranged automatically (The elements will also be rebuilt when the elements inside the frame are changed, except for deletion).


IMPORTANT: To automatically rearranged the elements, the UI panel must be open.


The plugin has the ability to sort the elements inside the frame in alphabetical order.


DSekon.com

Donate
plugins.tagline: The plugin moves the elements to the next line AUTOMATICALLY.

Select odd or even elements from multiple elements selection, base on position.


Elements must have same X OR Y position.
34552.tagline: Odd and Even Selector - Zebra Selector

plugins.name: Figma to Frappe Builder
plugins.description:
You can simply select the frames you want to copy and click on the "Copy Frame" button. The plugin will copy the converted frames to the clipboard. You can then paste the copied frames in the Frappe Builder.


Notes


- The plugin is currently in development and may have some issues.

- Only frames using auto-layout are expected to work correctly at this time.

- It is recommended to copy small sections of a page rather than the entire page.
plugins.tagline: Plugin to copy frames from Figma to Frappe Builder

117940.name: Figma to Frappe Builder
117940.description:
You can simply select the frames you want to copy and click on the "Copy Frame" button. The plugin will copy the converted frames to the clipboard. You can then paste the copied frames in the Frappe Builder.


Notes


- The plugin is currently in development and may have some issues.

- Only frames using auto-layout are expected to work correctly at this time.

- It is recommended to copy small sections of a page rather than the entire page.
117940.release_notes:
- Fixed standard style mapping
- Auto set relative width even if auto-layout is disabled
- Fix child positioning
117940.tagline: Plugin to copy frames from Figma to Frappe Builder

plugins.name: Lorem Ipsum Generator
plugins.description: Boost your design workflow with the Lorem Ipsum Inserter plugin for Figma. This easy-to-use plugin allows you to quickly add placeholder text to your designs. Whether you're working on prototypes, mockups, or UI components, simply click the button, and a block of Lorem Ipsum text will be inserted directly into your canvas. Additionally, the plugin supports replacing selected text with Lorem Ipsum, making it a time-saver for busy designers. Ideal for UI/UX designers looking to streamline their process with professional-looking placeholder text
plugins.tagline: Instantly insert Lorem Ipsum text into your designs with a single click

126847.name: Lorem Ipsum Generator
126847.description: Boost your design workflow with the Lorem Ipsum Inserter plugin for Figma. This easy-to-use plugin allows you to quickly add placeholder text to your designs. Whether you're working on prototypes, mockups, or UI components, simply click the button, and a block of Lorem Ipsum text will be inserted directly into your canvas. Additionally, the plugin supports replacing selected text with Lorem Ipsum, making it a time-saver for busy designers. Ideal for UI/UX designers looking to streamline their process with professional-looking placeholder text

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin requires access to all domains to fetch placeholder images and lorem ipsum text from various sources.

126847.release_notes:
Key Features (Excerpt for Release Notes)
Dynamic Word Count Matching: "Smart Lorem Ipsum" counts the number of words in each text layer within a frame (excluding punctuation) and generates Lorem Ipsum text with the exact same word count. For example, if a text layer contains "Hi, Jonathan" (2 words), it will be replaced with "Lorem ipsum" (2 words).
Seamless Integration: All text layers within a frame are automatically detected and updated with a single click.
126847.tagline: Instantly insert Lorem Ipsum text into your designs with a single click

plugins.name: Table of Contents - An Index Page Generator
plugins.description:
Say goodbye to redundant index page creation and hello to effortless organization with Table of Contents Figma Plugin - An Index Page Generator


  1. This plugin will help you quickly generate a basic Table of Contents (ToC) for your design files, making it easier for you to style and team and stakeholders to navigate project density.
  2. Page Creation happens with a click on "Generate." A new page with a Table of Contents will be added to your Figma file, organizing your design for easy reference.
  3. Hierarchical Indexing supports both top-level items and nested sub-items, preserving the structure of the sections and frames you select.
  4. Using the plugin get the redundant work out of the way.


This plugin is perfect for anyone working on complex projects with multiple frames and sections. Whether you’re working solo or in a collaborative environment, it helps bring clarity to your design files, making them more accessible and (hopefully 🤞) understandable for everyone involved.


This plugin is part of a series focused on elevating the little things we designers need! It’s also a way of giving back to the design community. xOxO

accepted.name: Mina Awadallah
accepted.description: A designer with a simple purpose!

plugins.tagline: Easily generate Table of contents / Index however you name it!

plugins.name: Bulk Banner
plugins.description:
Streamline Ad Campaign Production


Transform your Figma frames into animated banner ads instantly.

Perfect for Google Ads, Criteo, AdRoll, and more!

Key Features:


  1. Batch create GIFs or HTML5 ads from Figma frames
  2. Intuitive naming system for easy customization
  3. Automate duration and loop settings
  4. Organize outputs into folders automatically


Save hours on repetitive tasks. Ideal for advertising pros handling multiple campaigns.
plugins.tagline: Transform multiple frames into animated gif/html banner.

plugins.name: Accessibility Contrast Checker
plugins.description:
Accessibility Contrast Checker helps you quickly check the contrast of text layers in your Figma designs for WCAG compliance. The results clearly show which layers pass or fail the contrast standards, making it easy to improve accessibility.


How to Use:

  1. Select a frame with text layers, or simply select one or more text layers.
  2. Click the "Check" button.
  3. Review the results to see which layers pass or fail WCAG contrast compliance.


That's it! 🎉


Note: Currently, the plugin works best with solid backgrounds. It might not handle hidden layers, low opacity settings, or gradients perfectly.
plugins.tagline: Easily check text contrast for WCAG compliance on solid backgrounds in your Figma designs.

109171.name: Accessibility Contrast Checker
109171.description:
Accessibility Contrast Checker helps you quickly check the contrast of text layers in your Figma designs for WCAG compliance. The results clearly show which layers pass or fail the contrast standards, making it easy to improve accessibility.


How to Use:

  1. Select a frame with text layers, or simply select one or more text layers.
  2. Click the "Check" button.
  3. Review the results to see which layers pass or fail WCAG contrast compliance.


That's it! 🎉


Note: Currently, the plugin works best with solid backgrounds. It might not handle hidden layers, low opacity settings, or gradients perfectly.
109171.tagline: Easily check text contrast for WCAG compliance on solid backgrounds in your Figma designs.

plugins.name: Text node name to id
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you append the id of all the selected text nodes to their names. The format will then be: 'TextNode<node-id=node.id>'. This action is reversible.
The plugin also lets you export the selected text nodes to your clipboard. If you choose 'Advanced export', you can add any prefix to your node ids. The export action will copy the node ids in an YAML format. It will also add the color, font style, and text decoration to the node.characters. The resulted text will be easily usable in html files. The plugin also formats multiline texts.

7903.name: Text node name to id
7903.description:
This plugin lets you append the id of all the selected text nodes to their names. The format will then be: 'TextNode<node-id=node.id>'. This action is reversible.
The plugin also lets you export the selected text nodes to your clipboard. If you choose 'Advanced export', you can add any prefix to your node ids. The export action will copy the node ids in an YAML format. It will also add the color, font style, and text decoration to the node.characters. The resulted text will be easily usable in html files. The plugin also formats multiline texts.

plugins.name: Image EffectSync
plugins.description:
This plugin allows users to copy adjustment settings (such as exposure, contrast, saturation, etc.) from one image and paste them onto multiple selected images. With a simple operation, users can batch adjust the image effects of several pictures. The plugin supports the following features:


Copy Settings: Copy all image adjustment settings from a selected image, including exposure, contrast, saturation, temperature, tint, highlights, and shadows.


Paste Settings: Apply the copied adjustment settings to multiple selected images, ensuring consistent effects across all images, saving time and increasing efficiency.


This plugin is ideal for designers who need to apply consistent image effects across multiple images, especially when working on style uniformity or adjustments.
plugins.tagline: Copy adjusments from image

121283.name: Image EffectSync
121283.description:
This plugin allows users to copy adjustment settings (such as exposure, contrast, saturation, etc.) from one image and paste them onto multiple selected images. With a simple operation, users can batch adjust the image effects of several pictures. The plugin supports the following features:


Copy Settings: Copy all image adjustment settings from a selected image, including exposure, contrast, saturation, temperature, tint, highlights, and shadows.


Paste Settings: Apply the copied adjustment settings to multiple selected images, ensuring consistent effects across all images, saving time and increasing efficiency.


This plugin is ideal for designers who need to apply consistent image effects across multiple images, especially when working on style uniformity or adjustments.
121283.release_notes:
This update addresses user feedback on image pasting. A new checkbox has been added to give users more control over the scalemode value:

Default: The scalemode remains unchanged when pasting.
Uncheck: The scalemode will be adjusted to match the new image.
This simple option allows users to customize their experience and streamline their workflow.

plugins.name: Sticky Notes - Stickies
plugins.description:
Sticky Note Creator: Effortless Visual Note-Taking in Figma


Transform your design workflow with our intuitive Sticky Note Creator plugin! Quickly generate customizable, visually appealing sticky notes directly within your Figma workspace.


🌈 Key Features:

- Instant Sticky Note Generation

- Multiple Color Palette Options

- Responsive Design

- Easy Text Input

- Seamless Figma Integration


✨ How It Works:

1. Select your desired background color

2. Enter your text

3. Click "Create Sticky Note"

4. Instantly add notes to your design canvas


🎨 Color Options:

- Soft Yellow

- Pastel Pink

- Light Blue

- Mint Green

- Neutral Gray


Perfect for:

- Design brainstorming

- User journey mapping

- Quick annotations

- Project planning

- Creative ideation


Streamline your design process and keep your ideas organized with Sticky Note Creator!
plugins.tagline: Stickies with Light weight interface

plugins.name: Data Table Builder Pro
plugins.description:
Data Table Builder Pro is a powerful Figma plugin designed to help you quickly create, customize, and save reusable table designs.


Build Data Tables Fast

Add multiple columns with different data types (text, number, boolean, ratings, labels, avatars, and more) so you can shape your table exactly how you need it.


Visual Table Builder

Edit columns in a live preview with inline editing. Easily tweak styling, spacing, borders, and more.


Theming & Auto-layout Controls

Choose from Shadcn themes and customize any element color to suit your brand or design and as row or column based auto layout.


CSV Import

Quickly populate large tables by importing CSV data. Perfect for teams handling data from spreadsheets.


Save & Reuse Templates

Save your tables—complete with styling and layout—to reuse next time. You can store unlimited custom templates and iterate on them over time.


Clearly Named Layers

Export your table into Figma file as ready-to-use auto-layout frames with easy to understand layer names.


Why Use Data Table Builder Pro?


Time-Saving

Create data-dense mockups fast without manually creating rows and columns.


Consistent Designs

Ensure your tables maintain a polished look across multiple projects thanks to reusable templates.


Flexible & Customizable

Tailor column types, theme colors, and layout directions to fit your exact needs.


Collaborative

Import real data from CSV for realistic scenarios or stakeholder presentations.


Give your data the presentation it deserves and level up your Figma projects with Table Templates Pro!


Free trial limitations:

  1. 3 table exports
  2. No saved tables

accepted.name: Superbig
accepted.description: 👋 Hey there! My name is Chris and I'm a product designer who the builds plugins I want to use.

plugins.tagline: Create, customize, and save reusable data tables with CSV data or easy to edit templates.

plugins.name: Unsplash Stock Photo Search
plugins.description:
Enhance your design workflow with our sleek, modern dark-mode Figma plugin that gives you instant access to high-quality, professional images—powered by Unsplash, the world’s leading free image source.


✨ Features you'll love:


🎯 Smart Search & Random Refresh – Find the perfect image in seconds or explore new inspiration with a single click.


⚡ One-Click Insertion – Instantly insert images directly into your Figma designs.


💫 Smooth Animations & Transitions – Enjoy a visually pleasing, seamless experience.


🚀 Fast, Lightweight & Efficient – Built for UI/UX designers who value speed and simplicity.


🎨 Modern Dark Mode UI – Clean, responsive design perfect for day or night work.


📱 Mobile-Friendly & Responsive – Looks great on all screen sizes.


💯 100% Free to Use – No hidden fees, no subscriptions, no watermarks.


✨ No Sign-Up or Credit Card Required – Just install and start designing.


☕ Support the Project with a Coffee – Optional, never required.


🔄 Regular Updates – We’re always improving based on your feedback.

plugins.name: Google Sheets & EasyContent Sync
plugins.description:
Tired of using “Lorem Ipsum” and generic images and then realizing that the text doesn’t fit or the image aspect ratio is different? Why not use your REAL content?


NEW: Introduced free Figma - Google Sheets integration


Watch the overview video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uuEsBKcnNp8


Say goodbye to placeholder text and Lorem Ipsum! The EasyContent plugin bridges the gap between your content and your design team by bringing your actual website content directly into Figma. Enhance your workflow, improve collaboration, and create designs that truly reflect the final product.


Why Use the EasyContent Plugin?

Designing with fake content can lead to broken experiences and costly revisions. With EasyContent, you can:

  1. Enhance Collaboration: Align your design and content teams by working with real content.
  2. Improve UX: Stress-test your designs with actual content to ensure they work in all scenarios.
  3. Impress Stakeholders: Present realistic mockups that accurately reflect the final product.


Key Features

  1. Direct Integration with EasyContent.io: Securely connect your EasyContent projects to Figma.
  2. Drag and Drop Content Fields: Easily insert text and images from your content projects into your designs.
  3. Content Swapping: Swap between different content items to test layouts and stress-test designs.
  4. Real-Time Updates: Keep your designs up-to-date with the latest content from your projects.
  5. Support for Text and Images: Currently supports single-line text, multi-line text, rich text, and images.


Who Is This Plugin For?

  1. Marketing and Web Design Agencies: Streamline your workflow by integrating content and design tools.
  2. Design Teams: Collaborate effectively with content creators and ensure designs are content-ready.
  3. Content Creators: Visualize how content will appear in the final design and provide feedback.


Getting Started

  1. Install the Plugin: Download the EasyContent plugin from the Figma Marketplace.
  2. Connect Your Account: Enter your EasyContent API key to securely connect your projects. If you don’t have an account, create it here: https://easycontent.io/
  3. Select a Project and Template: Choose the content you want to work with.
  4. Drag and Drop Content: Insert content fields directly into your design.


Future Developments

We're continuously improving the EasyContent plugin. Upcoming features include support for additional content types like checkboxes, radio buttons, selects, and dates.


Need Help or Have Suggestions?

We're here to support you. If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us at support@easycontent.io.


Transform Your Design Process Today

Elevate your designs by integrating real content directly from EasyContent. Install the EasyContent plugin now and experience a more efficient, collaborative, and realistic design process!
plugins.tagline: Design with real content, not placeholders. Bridge the gap between your content and design teams!

3: You can convert the path in the selected node's svg data to Android svg xml
